fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player. From now on, every message they send must contain a swear word. The host decides what is a swear and what isn't.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Every message you send must contain a swear word. The host decides what is a swear and what isn't.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the point in the game at which at least 50 swear words have been uttered by other players.
